This is a good example of why I say Uob earmark promo is effectively a 6 month lock in.1. You have fears of such incidents if u only transfer in on last day2. The amount u move in on last day  even if successful  will not earn 4% pa.3. If I was participating in the Uob earmark promo which requires me to bring in the money by 31st January 2025  I would have funded by account on 2nd January 2025 with $155 000 so my adb for January 2025 is $150k.
